name: The Supreme Way
author: Pikapi &#40噼咔噼&#41
content: This is a world where all people have the hope of becoming gods. Taking the path of the Thunder God, one can become a Thunder God. After taking the path of Mountain God, one can become a Mountain God. After becoming a god, one can open up a divine kingdom. The crossover Lai Cang had no money and no talent to take the God path, but in an accident, he became the first in history to open up God kingdom before becoming a God!
